name: Leftover Spirits
description:
This is the place where you can defeat your spirits. An interior battle, inside of us, that has been going on for millennia. Don't let your unconscious beat yourself, don't let your emotions overpower. Keep playing, don't give up.

Shoot against your deepest fears and disillusions in an arcade game with a peaceful, open, and relaxing map. Let your butterflies help you in this mission, but be aware of the enemies' ones. Beat your records and unlock the skins with which you can feel more comfortable. Don't be afraid of the objects on the map, they can't touch you: you're a spirit.

HOW TO PLAY

This is an arcade game. You can move freely on the map and shoot with unlimited bullets. With each round, a new enemy will spawn and you will have to defeat him to continue. The further you go, the stronger your enemies become. If the enemy is close enough you can find him by following your butterflies, which will help you in the battle. Enemies also have butterflies that will damage you if you touch them. Moreover, there are smaller enemies, avoid touching them.

GAME CONTROLS
WASD or ARROWS - move around
mouse POINT and CLICK - shoot 
This game does not support mobile.
